name: Execution/Finisher Add-On for Invector
description:
Note:Requires Invector Third Person Shooter/Melee 

This add-on extends Invector Melee Combat System by adding Execution/Finisher feature which mostly found in AAA games such as Assassin's Creed and Dark Souls.

Downloadable includes  videos of the following.

1) Setting up the demo scene

2) Setting up a new character and unarmed execution

3) Setting up execution in a weapon

4) Setting up backstab in a weapon

The demo has  free animations from Mixamo, Ramzter, Invector Stealth.

Videos 2 to 4 show some paid assets which are not included in the package. But here are the links of these paid assets:

-https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/humanoids/fantasy/furrys2-so...

-https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/animations/samurai-10-executions-animse...

-https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/animations/protector-animset-168737

This addon will be updated.
